Title: Scaffold: index.html, styles.css, src/, assets/, package.json

Specs: specs/game-spec.md

Summary:
Create the project scaffold: index.html, styles.css, src/ with main.js, basic entities folder, tests/ placeholder, assets/ and package.json with scripts: start, lint, test.

Acceptance criteria:
- repo serves via npx serve . (npm start)
- npm run lint && npm test run (tests may be placeholders)
- basic README updated with run instructions
